Group hierarchy:
Increased the S3 Intelligent Tiering storage 50TB per month to 80TB (as only the newly uploaded pictures will be accessed more frequently).
From the Business Support plan, get down to Developer plan.
Instead of the on demand EC2 instances, pay upfront for the 1 year standard reserved instances. 
Instead of the RDS on demand instances, pay upfront for the 1 year standard reserved instances.
Paying upfront for 1 year has a risk associated with it, but if the application is mature or the company can reuse the resources in some other way, reserved can save a lot of cost.
Another option could have been to move to a region where cost is less (if not too far from End-Customers).
